titleStmt.title: The resolution of the agitators of the army, concerning the prosecution of their late remonstrance and protestation against the sitting of the late usurpers of Parliamentary power in the Parliament. With the reasons constraining them so resolutely to adhere to that their protestation. As they presented to his Excellency Sir Thomas Fairfax Septemb. 2. 1647.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
